greeting.speaker: Old Librarian
greeting.text: Ah, an adventurer... I've been expecting someone. This dungeon holds dark secrets. Perhaps you could help uncover the truth?

choices.text: What do you know about the guards?

secrets.speaker: Old Librarian
secrets.text: The warden has been conducting forbidden rituals in the lower chambers. I found this torn page from his journal...

after_secret.speaker: Old Librarian
after_secret.text: Take this healing salve as well. You'll need it down there. Be careful, adventurer.

dismiss.speaker: Old Librarian
dismiss.text: A pity. Well, if you change your mind, you know where to find me. These old bones aren't going anywhere.

guards.speaker: Old Librarian
guards.text: So you've noticed their patrol patterns too. The night shift guards leave the east corridor unattended. That's your window.

clues.name: Warden's Ritual Page
clues.description: A torn journal page describing forbidden rituals in the lower chambers.

clues.name: Librarian's Lament
clues.description: The old librarian knows more than he lets on. He seems regretful.

clues.name: Guard Patrol Notes
clues.description: The guards follow a predictable pattern, suggesting the warden controls them.

clues.name: East Corridor Secret
clues.description: A five-minute window when the east corridor is unguarded.

clues.name: Scratched Wall Markings
clues.description: Strange symbols scratched into the cell wall by a previous prisoner.

mystery.solvedText: The truth is revealed! The warden's rituals, the controlled guards, and the east corridor escape route all connect. You've solved the mystery!

items.name: Healing Salve
items.description: A soothing herbal salve that restores 1 heart.

items.name: Rusty Key
items.description: An old iron key. It might open something.
